title: encoding/xml: add omitempty tag attribute
body:
encoding/xml is missing omitempty (like encoding/json's).
Without omitempty you are forced to use pointers to keep
xml from writing out empty values; that is, you have to use
*string instead of string.  Because this constrains data layout
(and makes common cases awkward), we should try to get
omitempty in before Go 1.  The definition of empty should
be the same as in json.
